DOC.brief_title: Repeat Dose Study Fluticasone Propionate/Salmeterol Versus Fluticasone Propionate + Salmeterol In Asthmatics

DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Documented history mild intermittent asthma Have PEF FEV1 > 80 % predict Not smoker BMI 19 29 Exclusion criterion : Have life threaten episode asthma Have respiratory tract infection last four week Have respiratory disease Have take certain medication within restricted time period
